description: This Python script demonstrates how to set up and use an agent with personalized memory and session summaries, utilizing a PostgreSQL database with pgvector for storage.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model, memory, storage, and other settings.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Handles storage of memories in a PostgreSQL database with pgvector support.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Manages the agent's memory, interfacing with the database.

classes.name: Cohere
classes.description: Represents the Cohere language model used by the agent.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of session data in a PostgreSQL database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent based on the input prompt, streaming the output.
